hero.description: SAIL (Smart AI Listening) analyzes your meeting recordings using AI to deliver engagement insights, speaker analytics, summaries, and actionable feedback — automatically.

steps.title: Upload Meeting
steps.description: Upload your meeting’s audio or video recording securely.

steps.title: AI Processing
steps.description: SAIL transcribes speech, identifies speakers, and analyzes behavior.
